attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置传感器节点是否有效.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [size &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,+∞) 代理传感器盒的尺寸. 提示: size 0 0 0 值将使传感器失效.
attribute.name: size

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户摄像机走进或离开的监测区域时发送isActive true/false 事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [position_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户摄像机在监测区域中移动时, 发送相对于中心的 translation事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: position_changed

attribute.tooltip: [orientation_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户摄像机在监测区域中转动时, 发送相对于中心的rotation事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: orientation_changed

attribute.tooltip: [enterTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户摄像机走进监测区域时发送时间事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: enterTime

attribute.tooltip: [exitTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户摄像机走进或离开的监测区域发送时间事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: exitTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: ROUTE 连接节点之间的域以传递事件. Warning: each ROUTE must follow the DEF definition of both event-source and event-target nodes. Warning: strongly typed event checking means that data type (SFInt32, MFVec3f, etc.) must match identically for both event-source and event-target fields. Warning: event-source fields can have accessType outputOnly or inputOutput, while event-target nodes can have accessType inputOnly or inputOutput. Hint: event tracing supports animation debugging https://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter07-EventAnimationInterpolation/Chapter07-EventAnimationInterpolation-EventTracing.pdf Hint: X3D Architecture 7.2.5.7 ROUTE statement https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#ROUTEStatement
element.name: ROUTE

attribute.tooltip: [fromNode type IDREF #REQUIRED] fromNode 是发送事件的节点的DEF名.
attribute.name: fromNode

attribute.tooltip: [fromField type NMTOKEN #REQUIRED] fromField 是发送事件的节点的域的名称. 提示: 可能需要在域名上使用后缀 _changed.
attribute.name: fromField

attribute.tooltip: [toNode type IDREF #REQUIRED] toNode 是接受事件的节点的DEF名.
attribute.name: toNode

attribute.tooltip: [toField type NMTOKEN #REQUIRED] toField 是接受事件的节点的域的名称. 提示: 可能需要在域名上使用前缀set_ .
attribute.name: toField

element.tooltip: ScalarInterpolator 产生指定范围内的一系列线性values 可以被路由到其他的Float属性. 典型输入: ROUTE someTimeSensorDEF.fraction_changed TO someInterpolatorDEF.set_fraction 典型输出: ROUTE someInterpolatorDEF.value_changed TO destinationNode.set_attribute.
element.name: ScalarInterpolator

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [key &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] 定义线性插值器的时间间隔, 按照顺序增加, 对应相应的keyValue. 提示: key 和keyValue的数量必须一致! Warning: values in key array shall be monotonically non-decreasing, meaning that each value is greater than or equal to the preceding value. Hint: typical interval for values in key array is within range of 0 to 1, but larger intervals can be defined with arbitrary bounds.
attribute.name: key

attribute.tooltip: [keyValue &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] 对应key的相应关键值, 用来进行相应时间段的线性插值. 提示: key 和keyValue的数量必须一致!
attribute.name: keyValue

attribute.tooltip: [set_fraction &inputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] set_fraction 输入一个key 值, 以进行相应的keyValue 输出. Hint: set_fraction values are typically in same range interval as values in the key array. Response to an input set_fraction value less than minimum is equivalent to minimum key, and response to an input set_fraction value greater than maximum is equivalent to maximum key. Warning: it is an error to define this transient inputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a destination for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: set_fraction

attribute.tooltip: [value_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] 按照相应的key和keyValue对, 输出相应时间段的线性插值 Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: value_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Scene 是包含 X3D场景图的根节点. 以此增加节点和子节点以创建场景. 在每个文件里只允许有一个Scene 根节点. 提示: Scene fields 暴露了Script节点Browser 类的功能. 注意: 用Inline引用场景中的Scene节点和根Scene节点报告同等的值. 警告: 浏览器对这个节点fields的支持还在实验性阶段. Warning: Scene is a child of X3D statement, and must follow the (optional) head statement.
element.name: Scene

element.tooltip: Script 让场景可以有程序化的行为. 用<field> 标签定义脚本的界面. 脚本的代码使用一个子 CDATA节点或使用一个url field (不推荐) . 可选脚本语言支持: ECMAScript (JavaScript) 或 (经由url到一个myNode.class类文件) Java. Hint: apply containerField='watchList' when parent node is LoadSensor.
element.name: Script

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [url &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 指向脚本或包含脚本的节点 首选的方法是把url scripts: 插入一个CDATA 节点以整合到源代码中 CDATA 可以保护 < 和> 等字符格式以适合脚本的语法. 提示: ECMAScript 和JavaScript相等. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, urls https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#urls
attribute.name: url

attribute.tooltip: [directOutput &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 如果脚本中涉及到节点, 或使用节点属性的直接存取修改, 那么设置directOutput 值为true. 提示: 需要用脚本动态的建立或打断路由, 设置directOutput 值为true如果. 提示: directOutput 提示浏览器避免过优化引用的节点, 因为脚本可以改变节点属性而不经过路由事件. 提示: directOutput false值意味着不能修改引用的节点或修改路由.
attribute.name: directOutput

attribute.tooltip: [mustEvaluate &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 如果 mustEvaluate值为false, 浏览器可以延迟发送输入事件到脚本直到需要输出时. 如果mustEvaluate值为true, 脚本直接接受输入事件而没有浏览器的延迟. 提示: 设置 mustEvaluate true值当经由网络发送/接受值.
attribute.name: mustEvaluate

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN (children | watchList) "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Shape 可以放在任何组节点下. Shape 可以包含Appearance节点和geometry节点 (比如 Box Cone Cylinder ElevationGrid Extrusion IndexedFaceSet IndexedLineSet LineSet PointSet Sphere Text). 可以用符合类型定义的原型 ProtoInstance来替代 Hint: X3D Architecture 12.2.1 Shape nodes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/shape.html#Shapenodes Hint: X3D Architecture 17.2.2 Lighting model https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/lighting.html#Lightingmodel Hint: apply containerField='shape' if parent node is CADFace.
element.name: Shape

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [appearance &inputOutputLabel; &SFNodeLabel;, NULL node] [X3DAppearanceNode] Single contained Appearance node that specifies visual attributes (such as material, texture, fillProperties and lineProperties) applied to corresponding geometry.
attribute.name: appearance

attribute.tooltip: [geometry &inputOutputLabel; &SFNodeLabel;, NULL node] [X3DGeometryNode] Single contained geometry node that is rendered according to corresponding appearance.
attribute.name: geometry

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN (children | proxy |shape) "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Sound 包含了一个AudioClip或MovieTexture节点以进行声音回放 在浏览器处理此场景内容时, 可以用符合类型定义的原型 ProtoInstance来替代. Hint: X3D Sound component Figure 16.2 Sound Node Geometry, https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/sound.html#f-Soundnodegeometry Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints:Audio https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Audio
element.name: Sound

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [location &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 声音中心的位置, 相对于局部坐标系统.
attribute.name: location

attribute.tooltip: [direction &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 1"] 声音轴的方向, 相对于局部坐标系统.
attribute.name: direction

attribute.tooltip: [intensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] 比例因素[0,1] 调节声音的大小(分贝).
attribute.name: intensity

attribute.tooltip: [minFront &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] 椭圆体方向上的最小衰减(全音量)的距离 确保minFront <= maxFront.
attribute.name: minFront

attribute.tooltip: [minBack &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] 椭圆体反方向上的最小衰减(全音量) 的距离 确保 minBack <= maxBack.
attribute.name: minBack

attribute.tooltip: [maxFront &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "10"] 椭圆体方向上的最大衰减(零音量)的距离 确保 minFront <= maxFront.
attribute.name: maxFront

attribute.tooltip: [maxBack &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "10"] 椭圆体反方向上的最大衰减(零音量)的距离 确保 minBack <= maxBack.
attribute.name: maxBack

attribute.tooltip: [priority &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] 浏览器优先级的提示[0,1]选择优先播放哪个声音.
attribute.name: priority

attribute.tooltip: [spatialize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 声音是否定向化播放. 提示: 只有在声音椭圆的范围内有效.
attribute.name: spatialize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField

attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Sphere 是一个几何节点, 用来创建一个球体. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点.
element.name: Sphere

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [radius &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] (0,+∞) 尺寸以米为单位. j警告: 简单几何尺寸一旦初始化后就不可以再更改,可以使用Transform 缩放尺寸.
attribute.name: radius

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置solid 值为true时只绘制多边形的一面(使用背面裁切), 设置solid 值为false 时绘制多边形的两面(关闭背面裁切). 警告: 缺省值为true时, 设置错误的物体从背面完全看不见!
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: SphereSensor 转换指点设备相对于原始局部坐标的球形动作到一个旋转值. 提示: 传感器影响同一级的节点及其子节点. 提示: 增加透明的几何对象以便于察看传感器的影响. Hint: X3D Architecture 20.2.1 Overview of pointing device sensors https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html#OverviewOfPointingDeviceSensors Hint: X3D Architecture 20.2.2 Drag sensors https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html#DragSensors Hint: X3D Architecture 20.2.3 Activating and manipulating pointing device sensors https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/pointingsensor.html#Activatingandmanipulating
element.name: SphereSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [description &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 这个节点功能的文字提示. 提示: 使用空格, 使描述更清晰易读. 提示: 如果需要,许多XML工具自动替换涉及的XML字符 (像 & 替换为& 或 " 替换为" ).
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置传感器节点是否有效.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [autoOffset &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 决定是否累积计算上一次的偏移值.
attribute.name: autoOffset

attribute.tooltip: [offset &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 1 0 0"] 发送事件并存储上次感应到的值的改变.
attribute.name: offset

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当传感器的状态改变时, isActive true/false 发送事件. 按下鼠标主键时isActive=true, 放开时isActive=false. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isOver &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当指点设备移动过传感器表面时发送事件 Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isOver

attribute.tooltip: [rotation_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFRotationLabel; #FIXED ""] rotation_changed 事件是相对位移加上offset偏移值的和. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: rotation_changed

attribute.tooltip: [trackPoint_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; #FIXED ""] trackPoint_changed 事件给出了虚拟几何体上感应的交点. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events. Warning: trackPoint_changed events represent unclamped intersection points on plane surface. Browsers can interpret drags off of the surface in various ways. Note that translation_changed events are clamped by minPosition/maxPosition and thus may be preferable.
attribute.name: trackPoint_changed

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: SpotLight 是一个光束, 只照亮指定圆锥范围内的几何体 光线照亮所有的几何对象,并不限制于场景图的层级. 光线自身没有可见的形状, 也不会被几何形体阻挡而形成阴影. 提示: HeadLight 由NavigationInfo节点控制.
element.name: SpotLight

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [on &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 打开/关闭光源
attribute.name: on

attribute.tooltip: [color &inputOutputLabel; &SFColorLabel; "1 1 1"] [0,1] 光的颜色, 可以影响到对象的颜色.
attribute.name: color

attribute.tooltip: [location &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 灯光位置, 相对局部坐标系统.
attribute.name: location

attribute.tooltip: [direction &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 -1"] 灯光方向, 相对局部坐标系统.
attribute.name: direction

attribute.tooltip: [intensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1"] [0,1] 灯光亮度.
attribute.name: intensity

attribute.tooltip: [ambientIntensity &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] [0,1] 灯光发散的环境亮度(无方向的背景光).
attribute.name: ambientIntensity

attribute.tooltip: [attenuation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 0 0"] 设置衰减因素:(Constant)常量, (linear-distance)线性距离, (squared-distance) 线性平方.
attribute.name: attenuation

attribute.tooltip: [radius &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "100"] 灯光效果的最大范围, 相对灯光的距离, 受父节点比例影响.
attribute.name: radius

attribute.tooltip: [beamWidth &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.7854"] [0,1.570796] 内部立体角(弧度)以内光亮为完全亮度 如果beamWidth > cutOffAngle, beamWidth 会重设为和 cutOffAngle相等. Hint: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radian
attribute.name: beamWidth

attribute.tooltip: [cutOffAngle &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "1.570796"] [0,1.570796] 外部立体角(弧度)以外光亮度衰减为0. 如果beamWidth > cutOffAngle, beamWidth 会重设为和 cutOffAngle相等. Hint: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radian
attribute.name: cutOffAngle

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: StaticGroup 是一个可以包含其它节点的组节点. StaticGroup 的子节点应该不会改动, 也不发送和接受事件, 也不应包含可引用的节点. 这个节点是方便浏览器优化的场景. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点. Warning: requires X3D profile='Full' or else include <component name='Grouping' level='3'/>
element.name: StaticGroup

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: 当用户在键盘上按下键时, StringSensor 产生事件. Browser support includes the notion of "keyboard focus".
element.name: StringSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置传感器节点是否有效.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [deletionAllowed &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 如果deletionAllowed为true值, 在输入文字的时候可以删除字符. 如果deletionAllowed 为false值, 就只可以往输入字符串中加值. 提示: 删除键一般就是局部系统中定义的删除键.
attribute.name: deletionAllowed

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当传感器的状态改变时, isActive true/false 发送事件. 按下键时isActive=true, 放开时isActive=false. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [enteredText &outputOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #FIXED ""] 当按下字符键的时候产生事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: enteredText

attribute.tooltip: [finalText &outputOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #FIXED ""] 当击键值符合terminationText字符串时产生事件 此时, enteredText 值移动到finalText值同时enteredText设置为空字符串. 提示: 结束键一般就是局部系统中定义的结束键. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: finalText

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Switch 是一个组节点, 在同一时间内只显示一个选定的子节点(也可能一个也不显示). Switch 节点可以包含大多数节点. (包含的节点改名为'children' 而不是原来的 'choice', 目的是统一所有 GroupingNodeType 节点的命名规则.) 不管是否被选中, 所有的子j节点都持续的发送接受事件. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点. 提示: 作者可以把几何体临时放在Switch节点的未选定的子节点中, 以进行隐藏测试. Hint: GeoViewpoint OrthoViewpoint and Viewpoint share the same binding stack, so no more than one of these nodes can be bound and active at a given time. Warning: do not include GeoViewpoint OrthoViewpoint or Viewpoint as a child of LOD or Switch, instead use ViewpointGroup as parent to constrain location proximity where the viewpoint is available to user. Warning: results are undefined if a bindable node (Background, Fog, NavigationInfo, OrthoViewpoint, TextureBackground, Viewpoint) is a contained descendant node of either LOD or Switch. Hint: contained nodes must have type X3DChildNode, such as Group or Transform or Shape. Warning: Switch is not allowed as parent of Appearance, Material, Color, Coordinate, Normal or Texture nodes.
element.name: Switch

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [whichChoice &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "-1"] [-1,+∞) 激活子节点的索引, 从0开始数. 警告: 缺省whichChoice值为-1时, 不会选择(渲染)任何子节点, whichChoice值为0时选择第一个子节点.
attribute.name: whichChoice

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Text 是一个几何节点用以显示文字, 可以包含FontStyle节点以设置字体. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点. 在浏览器处理此场景内容时, 可以用符合类型定义的原型 ProtoInstance来替代.
element.name: Text

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [string &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] Single or multiple string values to present as Text. Each value in the string array (including empty strings) gets displayed on a separate line. 提示: 字符串可以是多值, 用引号分割每个字符串 提示: 字符串包含引号中套用的引号时, 在内层的引号前加反斜杠 例子: "say \"hello\" please" 提示: 如果需要,许多XML工具自动替换涉及的XML字符 (像 & 替换为& 或 " 替换为" ). Hint: relates to Internationalization (i18n) http://www.w3.org/standards/webdesign/i18n Example: https://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter02-GeometryPrimitives/TextIndex.html Example: https://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter02-GeometryPrimitives/TextSpecialCharactersIndex.html
attribute.name: string

attribute.tooltip: [length &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] 每个字符串变量的长度值的数组, 参照局部坐标系统. 每个字符串将被伸展或压缩.
attribute.name: length

attribute.tooltip: [maxExtent &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.0"] 如果超过maxExtent值, 限制/压缩所有的字符串的长度, 参照局部坐标系统.
attribute.name: maxExtent

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 设置solid 值为true时只绘制多边形的一面(使用背面裁切), 设置solid 值为false 时绘制多边形的两面(关闭背面裁切). 警告: 缺省值为true时, 设置错误的物体从背面完全看不见!
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: TextureBackground 使用一组垂直排列的色彩值来模拟地面和天空, Background 也可以在六个面上使用背景纹理. 子纹理节点的域名按照字母顺序有: backTexture, bottomTexture, frontTexture, leftTexture, rightTexture, topTexture. Background, Fog, NavigationInfo, TextureBackground, Viewpoint 节点都是可绑定节点. Warning: results are undefined if a bindable node (Background, Fog, NavigationInfo, OrthoViewpoint, TextureBackground, Viewpoint) is a contained descendant node of either LOD or Switch. Warning: each of the child ImageTexture or PixelTexture nodes must have unique containerField values for backTexture, bottomTexture, frontTexture, leftTexture, rightTexture, or topTexture. Hint: authors can have LoadSensor nodes receive notifications and send reporting events when background texture node(s) are loaded.
element.name: TextureBackground

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [skyColor &inputOutputLabel; &MFColorLabel; "0 0 0"] 天空半球上不同角度的颜色. 弧度角0.0时为第一个值, 描述了天顶(抬头)的颜色. 警告: skyColor 值必须比skyAngle值多一个. 警告: skyAngle=0 时的色彩值将被忽略. 概貌互换提示: 可能只渲染一个颜色, 其它颜色将被忽略. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Color https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Color
attribute.name: skyColor

attribute.tooltip: [skyAngle &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] [0,π] 弧度角度从0.0 (天顶) 增加到 π/2=1.570796 (水平) 到 π=3.14159 (天底). 警告: skyColor 值必须比skyAngle值多一个. 警告: skyAngle=0 时的色彩值将被忽略. 概貌互换提示: 这个域可能被忽略. Hint: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radian
attribute.name: skyAngle

attribute.tooltip: [groundColor &inputOutputLabel; &MFColorLabel; #IMPLIED] 地面半球上不同角度的颜色. 弧度角0.0 时为第一个值, 描述了天底(低头)的颜色. groundColor值必须比groundAngle值多一个. 概貌互换提示: 这个域可能被忽略. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Color https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Color
attribute.name: groundColor

attribute.tooltip: [groundAngle &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] [0,π/2] 弧度角度从0.0 (天底) 增加到 π/2=1.570796 (水平). 警告: groundColor值必须比groundAngle值多一个. 警告: groundAngle=0 时的色彩值将被忽略. 概貌互换提示: 这个域可能被忽略. Hint: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radian
attribute.name: groundAngle

attribute.tooltip: [transparency &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; "0"] 应用到纹理上的透明度.
attribute.name: transparency

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 输入事件set_bind为true激活这个节点, 输入事件set_bind为false禁止这个节点. 就是说设置bind 为true/false 将在堆栈中弹出/推开 (允许/禁止) 这个节点. Hint: paired node operations can be established by connecting set_bind and isBound fields of corresponding bindable nodes. Warning: it is an error to define this transient inputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a destination for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: set_bind

element.tooltip: TextureCoordinate 为基于顶点的几何体(比如ElevationGrid, IndexedFaceSet) 指定二维的 (s,t) 纹理坐标点 以在基于顶点的多边形片面上进行纹理帖图. 提示: 在添加TextureCoordinate节点前先添加Shape 节点和基于多边形/平面的几何节点. Hint: Texture mapping https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texture_mapping Hint: X3D Texturing component Figure 18.1, Texture map coordinate system https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#f-TextureMapCoordSystem

element.name: TextureTransform

attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "0 0"] 2D (s,t) 纹理坐标的上旋转和缩放的中心.

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] 围绕中心旋转纹理的单一角度(几何对象上的显示相对效果). 警告: 使用一个单一的弧度角度值, 不要使用4元组的旋转值.

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec2fLabel; "1 1"] 沿中心点的非一致性缩放 (几何对象上的显示相对效果).

element.tooltip: 当时间流逝时,TimeSensor不断的产生事件. 典型运用: ROUTE thisTimeSensorDEF.fraction_changed TO someInterpolatorDEF.set_fraction. 概貌互换提示: 如果cycleInterval < 0.01 秒, TimeSensor 可能被忽视. Hint: event timing details are explained in X3D Specification 4.4.8.3 Execution model https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/concepts.html#ExecutionModel Hint: X3D Architecture 8 Time component https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/time.html
element.name: TimeSensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置传感器节点是否有效.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [cycleInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "1.0"] [0,+∞) cycleInterval 用来设置循环的时间. 概貌互换提示: 如果cycleInterval < 0.01 秒, TimeSensor 可能被忽视. Warning: An active TimeSensor node ignores set_cycleInterval and set_startTime events. Hint: cycleInterval is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time.
attribute.name: cycleInterval

attribute.tooltip: [loop &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 当loop=true时循环, 当loop=false只运行一次.
attribute.name: loop

attribute.tooltip: [startTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] 当现在时间time now >= startTime, isActive 变为true值激活TimeSensor. 绝对时间: 从1970年1月1日, 00:00:00 GMT 经过的秒数. 提示: 一般通过路由接受一个时间值.
attribute.name: startTime

attribute.tooltip: [stopTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] 当stopTime <= time now现在时间, isActive变为false 值禁止TimeSensor . 绝对时间: 从1970年1月1日, 00:00:00 GMT 经过的秒数. 提示: 一般通过路由接受一个时间值. Warning: An active TimeSensor node ignores set_cycleInterval and set_startTime events. Warning:An active TimeSensor node ignores set_stopTime event values less than or equal to startTime.
attribute.name: stopTime

attribute.tooltip: [pauseTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] 当现在时间time now >= pauseTime, isPaused 值变为true暂停TimeSensor. 绝对时间: 从1970年1月1日, 00:00:00 GMT 经过的秒数. 提示: 一般通过路由接受一个时间值. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: pauseTime

attribute.tooltip: [resumeTime &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0"] 当resumeTime <= time now现在时间, isPaused值变为false 再次激活TimeSensor. 绝对时间: 从1970年1月1日, 00:00:00 GMT 经过的秒数. 提示: 一般通过路由接受一个时间值. Warning: not supported in VRML97.
attribute.name: resumeTime

attribute.tooltip: [cycleTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当开始时cycleTime 发送时间输出事件outputOnly, 当每次新循环开始的时候也发送 (用来同步其它基于时间的对象). Hint: cycleTime is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: cycleTime

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当回放开始/结束的时候发送 isActive true/false 事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [isPaused &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当回放暂停/继续的时候发送 isPaused true/false 事件. Warning: not supported in VRML97. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isPaused

attribute.tooltip: [fraction_changed &outputOnlyLabel; &SFFloatLabel; #FIXED ""] fraction_changed 持续发送[0,1] 范围之间的值以提供当前循环的进程. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: fraction_changed

attribute.tooltip: [time &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] [0,+∞) Time 持续发送绝对时间( 从1970年1月1日, 00:00:00 GMT 经过的秒数) 以提供一个计时模拟. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.

Warning: Transform contained by CADFace can only hold a single LOD or Shape node. attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [translation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 子节点的局部坐标系统原点的位置, 以米制计算的x, y, z值. 提示: 操作顺序是,先旋转方位 - 缩放, 然后按中心旋转, 然后移动.
attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] 子节点的局部坐标系统的方位(轴, 弧度角). 提示: 操作顺序是,先旋转方位 - 缩放, 然后按中心旋转, 然后移动.
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 从局部坐标原点的位移偏移, 现于旋转和缩放. 提示: 操作顺序是,先旋转方位 - 缩放, 然后按中心旋转, 然后移动.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 1 1"] 子节点的局部坐标系统的非一致的x-y-z 比例, 由center和scaleOrientation调节. 提示: 操作顺序是,先旋转方位 - 缩放, 然后按中心旋转, 然后移动.
attribute.name: scale

attribute.tooltip: [scaleOrientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] 缩放前子节点局部坐标系统的预旋转(允许沿着子节点任意方向缩放). 提示: 操作顺序是,先旋转方位 - 缩放, 然后按中心旋转, 然后移动.
attribute.name: scaleOrientation

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN (children | proxy |shape) "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: IndexedTriangleFanSet 是一个几何节点, 这个节点里可以包含Color, Coordinate|CoordinateDouble, Normal, TextureCoordinate节点. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点. 在浏览器处理此场景内容时, 可以用符合类型定义的原型 ProtoInstance来替代.
element.name: IndexedTriangleFanSet

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [index &initializeOnlyLabel; &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] (0,+∞) 用索引连接Coordinate中的坐标顶点以指定三角形
attribute.name: index

attribute.tooltip: [ccw &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] cw = 逆时针: 顶点坐标方位的顺序. 提示: ccw值为false 时可以翻转solid (背面裁切) 及法线方向.
attribute.name: ccw

attribute.tooltip: [colorPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Color 节点被应用于每顶点上(true) 还是每多边形上(false). Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Color https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Color
attribute.name: colorPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [normalPerVertex &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] Normal 节点被应用于每顶点上(true) 还是每多边形上(false) Hint: if no child Normal node is provided, the X3D browser shall automatically generate normals, using creaseAngle to determine smoothed shading across shared vertices.
attribute.name: normalPerVertex

attribute.tooltip: [solid &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置solid 值为true时只绘制多边形的一面(使用背面裁切), 设置solid 值为false 时绘制多边形的两面(关闭背面裁切). 警告: 缺省值为true时, 设置错误的物体从背面完全看不见!
attribute.name: solid

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "geometry"] containerField containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Viewpoint 指定用户视点在场景中的位置和方向. Background, Fog, NavigationInfo, TextureBackground, Viewpoint 节点都是可绑定节点. Hint: GeoViewpoint OrthoViewpoint and Viewpoint share the same binding stack, so no more than one of these nodes can be bound and active at a given time. Warning: do not include GeoViewpoint OrthoViewpoint or Viewpoint as a child of LOD or Switch, instead use ViewpointGroup as parent to constrain location proximity where the viewpoint is available to user. Hint: Regardless of viewpoint jump value at bind time, the relative viewing transformation between user's view and defined position/orientation is stored for later use when un-jumping (returning to the viewpoint when subsequent viewpoint is unbound). Hint: customizable design pattern for dedicated Viewpoint/NavigationInfo pair: <Viewpoint DEF='SpecialView'/> <NavigationInfo DEF='SpecialNav'/> <ROUTE fromNode='SpecialView' fromField='isBound' toNode='SpecialNav' toField='set_bind'/> Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Viewpoints https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Viewpoints
element.name: Viewpoint

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [description &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 为这个视点显示的文字描述或导航提示. 提示: 使用空格, 使描述更清晰易读. 警告: 没有description值的视点将不显示在浏览器的视点菜单里. 提示: 如果需要,许多XML工具自动替换涉及的XML字符 (像 & 替换为& 或 " 替换为" ). 概貌互换提示: 这个域可能被忽略.
attribute.name: description

attribute.tooltip: [position &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 10"] 视点位置, 相对局部坐标系统(x, y, z 以米为单位).
attribute.name: position

attribute.tooltip: [orientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] 视点方向(轴, 弧度角) , 相对局部坐标系统, 缺省为Z轴方向. 提示: 这个方向从缺省的(0 0 -1)方向变化而来. 提示: 复杂的旋转可以用父Transform的轴对轴旋转完成.
attribute.name: orientation

attribute.tooltip: [fieldOfView &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0.7854"] (0,π) 弧度值设定的视点可视角度. 小的视角相当于长镜头, 大视角相当于广角镜头. 提示: 修改视点和对象的距离可以更好的缩放. 警告: fieldOfView 对于不同的窗口大小和现实比例效果不一. 概貌互换提示: 这个域可能被忽略.
attribute.name: fieldOfView

attribute.tooltip: [jump &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 立刻转换到这个镜头设置 (jump值为true), "或平滑的动态转换到这个镜头(jump值为false).
attribute.name: jump

attribute.tooltip: [centerOfRotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] centerOfRotation 点被提议加入 NavigationInfo EXAMINE mode.
attribute.name: centerOfRotation

attribute.tooltip: [set_bind &inputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 输入事件set_bind为true激活这个节点, 输入事件set_bind为false禁止这个节点. 就是说设置bind 为true/false 将在堆栈中弹出/推开 (允许/禁止) 这个节点. Hint: paired node operations can be established by connecting set_bind and isBound fields of corresponding bindable nodes. Warning: it is an error to define this transient inputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a destination for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: set_bind

attribute.tooltip: [bindTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当节点被激活/停止时发送事件. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: bindTime

attribute.tooltip: [isBound &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当节点激活时发送true事件, 当焦点转到另一个节点时发送false事件. Hint: paired node operations can be established by connecting set_bind and isBound fields of corresponding bindable nodes. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isBound

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: VisibilitySensor 检测用户是否可以看见指定的对象或指定范围 这依赖场景的漫游. 指定的范围依靠边界盒判断. 提示: 可以用来吸引用户的注意或改进性能. 提示: 传感器影响同一级的节点及其子节点.
element.name: VisibilitySensor

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 设置传感器节点是否有效.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 从局部坐标系原点的位置偏移.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [size &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] [0,+∞) 从center中心以米测量的可视盒的尺寸 .
attribute.name: size

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 当触发传感器时发送isActive true/false 事件. 当用户视点进入传感器的可见范围时isActive值为true, 当用户视点离开传感器的可见范围时isActive值为false. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [enterTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户视点进入传感器的可见范围时产生事件时间. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: enterTime

attribute.tooltip: [exitTime &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 当用户视点离开传感器的可见范围时产生事件时间. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: exitTime

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: WorldInfo 包含场景的有关信息.
element.name: WorldInfo

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [title &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 场景的标题, 放置在窗口标题栏上. 提示: 如果需要,许多XML工具自动替换涉及的XML字符 (像 & 替换为& 或 " 替换为" ).
attribute.name: title

attribute.tooltip: [info &inputOutputLabel; &MFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 提供关于场景的额外信息. 提示: 字符串可以是多值, 用引号分割每个字符串 "https://www.web3d.org" "https://www.web3d.org/about" "其它网址." ]. 提示: 如果需要,许多XML工具自动替换涉及的XML字符 (像 & 替换为& 或 " 替换为" ).
attribute.name: info

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: Extensible 3D (X3D) 场景图文件的最高一级的XML节点. X3D 标签包含一个Scene节点 - Scene 场景节点是三维场景图的根节点. 提示: 添加或选择一个Scene标签以编辑场景图. Hint: X3D Architecture 7.2.5.2 Header statement https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#HeaderStatement
element.name: X3D

attribute.tooltip: [profile &profileNames; "Full"] 当前场景需要支持的概貌. 提示: Interchange 概貌负责相应的轻场景内核 core 并符合只输出的设计. 提示: Interactive 概貌或MPEG4概貌负责相应的KeySensor 类的交互. 提示: Extensibility 概貌负责交互, 脚本, 原型, 组件;提示: VRML97 概貌符合 VRML97 规格的向后兼容性. 提示: Full 概貌包括 X3D 200x 规格中的所有节点. Warning: PROFILE is capitalized and is a separate statement in the ClassicVRML Encoding. Hint: X3D Architecture 7.2.5.3 PROFILE statement https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#PROFILEStatement
attribute.name: profile

attribute.tooltip: [version "3.0" #REQUIRED] 相应版本 X3D version 3.0 对应 X3D/VRML 200x.
attribute.name: version

attribute.tooltip: [xmlns:xsd type CDATA "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"] XML namespace (xmlns) for XML Schema Definition (xsd). Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Validation of X3D Scenes using DTD and XML Schema https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Validation
attribute.name: xmlns:xsd

attribute.tooltip: [xsd:noNamespaceSchemaLocation type CDATA "https://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.0.xsd"] url for the X3D Schema defining the X3D document-validation rules. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Validation of X3D Scenes using DTD and XML Schema https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#Validation
attribute.name: xsd:noNamespaceSchemaLocation

element.tooltip: Comment 可以在场景中的任何地方使用, 以提高代码的可读性. 提示: 只用Comment 节点加入注释文字, 在属性值中不要加注释文字. 提示: VRML 注释使用#号开头的方法不再需要保留. 提示: 主要的必须加入场景的注释使用WorldInfo节点.
element.name: XML_COMMENT

element.tooltip: TEXT (text data)文本数据.
element.name: XML_TEXT

element.tooltip: CDATA (Character Data) Section 逐字的保留字符数据. CDATA 保证包含的文本不被 XML字符实体替换. 提示: CDATA 在Script 节点中保护 < 和 > 操作符. 提示: VRML 注释使用#号开头的方法不再需要保留. 提示: 主要的必须加入场景的注释使用WorldInfo节点.
element.name: XML_CDATA

element.tooltip: 处理指令(PI) - 使用PI向程序传输信息和指令.
element.name: XML_PI

element.tooltip: 文档定义类型Document Type Definition (DTD).
element.name: XML_DOCUMENT_TYPE

element.tooltip: EspduTransform 传输位移的节点, 可以包含在大多数节点里. EspduTransform 整合了以下DIS PDUs中的功能: EntityStatePdu, CollisionPdu, DetonatePdu, FirePdu, CreateEntity and RemoveEntity packets. 提示: 在增加 geometry或 Appearance节点之前先插入一个Shape节点. Hint: X3D for Advanced Modeling (X3D4AM) slideset https://x3dgraphics.com/slidesets/X3dForAdvancedModeling/DistributedInteractiveSimulation.pdf Warning: requires X3D profile='Full' or else include <component name='DIS' level='1'/>
element.name: EspduTransform

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 允许/禁止子节点的碰撞检测. 提示: VRML97规格中的 "collide" .
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [marking &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 最大11个字符的实体的简单标签.
attribute.name: marking

attribute.tooltip: [siteID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] 网络上参与者或组织的站点siteID.
attribute.name: siteID

attribute.tooltip: [applicationID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "1"] EntityID使用的ID, 以在应用中对应某个唯一的站点.
attribute.name: applicationID

attribute.tooltip: [entityID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] EntityID 在应用程序中使用的唯一的ID.
attribute.name: entityID

attribute.tooltip: [forceID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] forceID determines the team membership of the issuing entity, and whether FRIENDLY OPPOSING or NEUTRAL or OTHER.
attribute.name: forceID

attribute.tooltip: [entityKind &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for whether entity is a PLATFORM, MUNITION, LIFE_FORM, ENVIRONMENTAL, CULTURAL_FEATURE, SUPPLY, RADIO, EXPENDABLE, SENSOR_EMITTER or OTHER.
attribute.name: entityKind

attribute.tooltip: [entityDomain &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for domain in which the entity operates: LAND, AIR, SURFACE, SUBSURFACE, SPACE or OTHER.
attribute.name: entityDomain

attribute.tooltip: [entityCountry &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for country to which the design of the entity or its design specification is attributed.
attribute.name: entityCountry

attribute.tooltip: [entityCategory &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for main category that describes the entity, semantics of each code varies according to domain. See DIS Enumerations values.
attribute.name: entityCategory

attribute.tooltip: [entitySubCategory &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for particular subcategory to which an entity belongs based on the Category field. See DIS Enumerations values.
attribute.name: entitySubCategory

attribute.tooltip: [entitySpecific &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Specific information about an entity based on the Subcategory field. See DIS Enumerations values.
attribute.name: entitySpecific

attribute.tooltip: [entityExtra &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Any extra information required to describe a particular entity. The contents of this field shall depend on the type of entity represented.
attribute.name: entityExtra

attribute.tooltip: [readInterval &SFTimeLabel; "0.1"] 读更新的间隔秒数, 0 值将不读. Hint: readInterval is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time.
attribute.name: readInterval

attribute.tooltip: [writeInterval &SFTimeLabel; "1.0"] 写更新的间隔秒数, 0 值将不写. Hint: writeInterval is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time.
attribute.name: writeInterval

attribute.tooltip: [networkMode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &DisNetworkModeValues; standAlone] 决定实体是否忽略网络, 是否向网络发送DIS数据包 , 或是否从网络接受DIS 数据包. (1) standAlone: 忽略网络但仍然回应局部场景的事件. (2) networkReader: 只监听网络, 根据readInterval间隔从网络读取PDU数据包, 作为实体的远程遥控拷贝. (3) networkWriter: 根据writeInterval间隔向网络发送PDU数据包, 以担当主实体(master entity). 缺省值 "standAlone" 确保激活场景中的DIS网络 有目的的设置 networkReader 或 networkWriter. Warning: do not wrap extra quotation marks around these SFString enumeration values, since "quotation" "marks" are only used for MFString values.
attribute.name: networkMode

attribute.tooltip: [isStandAlone &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否 networkMode="local" (忽略网络但仍然回应局部场景的事件) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isStandAlone

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkReader &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否networkMode="remote" (只监听网络, 根据readInterval间隔从网络读取PDU数据包, 作为实体的远程遥控拷贝) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isNetworkReader

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkWriter &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否 networkMode="master" (根据writeInterval间隔向网络发送PDU数据包, 以担当主实体) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isNetworkWriter

attribute.tooltip: [address &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; localhost] 多点传输的网址"或其他本地主机localhost" 例子: 224.2.181.145.
attribute.name: address

attribute.tooltip: [port &SFInt32Label; #FIXED "0"] Network connection port number (EXAMPLE 3000) for sending or receiving DIS messages. 多点传输端口 例子: 3000.
attribute.name: port

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayHost &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 不能使用多点传输后使用的服务器网址. 例子: track.nps.edu.
attribute.name: multicastRelayHost

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayPort &SFInt32Label; "0"] 不能使用多点传输后使用的服务器端口. 例子: 8010.
attribute.name: multicastRelayPort

attribute.tooltip: [rtpHeaderExpected &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 是否DIS PDUs 中包含RTP headers.
attribute.name: rtpHeaderExpected

attribute.tooltip: [isRtpHeaderHeard &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否传入的DIS 数据包包含RTP header. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isRtpHeaderHeard

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 最近是否接收到网络更新? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [timestamp &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] VRML单位的DIS时间戳. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: timestamp

attribute.tooltip: [translation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 子节点的局部坐标系统原点的位置, 一般经由远端的网络读取或写入远端网络.
attribute.name: translation

attribute.tooltip: [rotation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] 子节点的局部坐标系统的方位, 一般经由远端的网络读取或写入远端网络.
attribute.name: rotation

attribute.tooltip: [center &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 从局部坐标原点的位移偏移.
attribute.name: center

attribute.tooltip: [scale &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "1 1 1"] 子节点的局部坐标系统的非一致的x-y-z 比例, 由center和scaleOrientation调节.
attribute.name: scale

attribute.tooltip: [scaleOrientation &inputOutputLabel; &SFRotationLabel; "0 0 1 0"] 缩放前子节点局部坐标系统的预旋转(允许沿着子节点任意方向缩放).
attribute.name: scaleOrientation

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [linearVelocity &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"]Velocity of the entity relative to the rotating Earth in either world or entity coordinates, depending on the dead reckoning algorithm used.
attribute.name: linearVelocity

attribute.tooltip: [linearAcceleration &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Acceleration of the entity relative to the rotating Earth in either world or entity coordinates, depending on the dead reckoning algorithm used.
attribute.name: linearAcceleration

attribute.tooltip: [deadReckoning &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] [0,65535] 使用的以线性速度/加速度矢量计算运动位置/方向的航位推测的运算法则.
attribute.name: deadReckoning

attribute.tooltip: [isCollided &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否有匹配的 CollisionPDU 报告发生碰撞? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isCollided

attribute.tooltip: [collideTime &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 发生碰撞的时间? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: collideTime

attribute.tooltip: [isDetonated &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否有匹配的 DetonationPDU 报告发生爆炸? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isDetonated

attribute.tooltip: [detonateTime &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 发生爆炸的时间?
attribute.name: detonateTime

attribute.tooltip: [fired1 &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 主要武器 (Fire PDU) 是否开火?
attribute.name: fired1

attribute.tooltip: [fired2 &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 次武器 (Fire PDU) 是否开火?
attribute.name: fired2

attribute.tooltip: [firedTime &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] 武器 (Fire PDU) 开火的时间? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: firedTime

attribute.tooltip: [fireMissionIndex &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; #FIXED ""]
attribute.name: fireMissionIndex

attribute.tooltip: [munitionStartPoint &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 输出事件, 使用用户演习坐标.
attribute.name: munitionStartPoint

attribute.tooltip: [munitionEndPoint &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 输出事件, 使用用户演习坐标.
attribute.name: munitionEndPoint

attribute.tooltip: [munitionSiteID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Munition siteID of the participating LAN or organization.
attribute.name: munitionSiteID

attribute.tooltip: [munitionApplicationID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "1"] munitionApplicationID, unique for application at that site. Each simulation application that can respond to simulation management PDUs needs to have a unique applicationID.
attribute.name: munitionApplicationID

attribute.tooltip: [munitionEntityID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] munitionEntityID is unique ID for entity firing munition within that application.
attribute.name: munitionEntityID

attribute.tooltip: [warhead &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for type of warhead on the munition.
attribute.name: warhead

attribute.tooltip: [fuse &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumerations value for type of fuse on the munition.
attribute.name: fuse

attribute.tooltip: [munitionQuantity &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Quantity of munitions fired.
attribute.name: munitionQuantity

attribute.tooltip: [firingRate &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Rate at which munitions are fired.
attribute.name: firingRate

attribute.tooltip: [firingRange &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] Range (three dimension, straight-line distance) that the firing entity's fire control system has assumed for computing the fire control solution if a weapon and if the value is known
attribute.name: firingRange

attribute.tooltip: [collisionType &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumeration for type of collision: ELASTIC or INELASTIC.
attribute.name: collisionType

attribute.tooltip: [detonationLocation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] World coordinates for detonationLocation
attribute.name: detonationLocation

attribute.tooltip: [detonationRelativeLocation &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] Relative coordinates for detonation location
attribute.name: detonationRelativeLocation

attribute.tooltip: [detonationResult &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Integer enumeration for type of detonation and result that occurred., if any.
attribute.name: detonationResult

attribute.tooltip: [eventApplicationID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "1"]Simulation/exercise eventApplicationID is unique for events generated from application at that site. Each simulation application that can respond to simulation management PDUs needs to have a unique applicationID.
attribute.name: eventApplicationID

attribute.tooltip: [eventEntityID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] For a given event, simulation/exercise entityID is a unique ID for a single entity within that application.
attribute.name: eventEntityID

attribute.tooltip: [eventNumber &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Sequential number of each event issued by an application. Warning: reuse of numbers may be necessary during long simulation exercises.
attribute.name: eventNumber

attribute.tooltip: [eventSiteID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Simulation/exercise siteID of the participating LAN or organization.
attribute.name: eventSiteID

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterCount &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Number of articulated parameters attached to this entity state PDU.
attribute.name: articulationParameterCount

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterDesignatorArray &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] Array of designators for each articulated parameter.
attribute.name: articulationParameterDesignatorArray

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterChangeIndicatorArray &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] Array of change counters, each incremented when an articulated parameter is updated.#IMPLIED]
attribute.name: articulationParameterChangeIndicatorArray

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterIdPartAttachedToArray &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] Array of ID parts that each articulated parameter is attached to.
attribute.name: articulationParameterIdPartAttachedToArray

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterTypeArray &MFInt32Label; #IMPLIED] 指定元素组属性参数的类型.
attribute.name: articulationParameterTypeArray

attribute.tooltip: [articulationParameterArray &inputOutputLabel; &MFFloatLabel; #IMPLIED] Information required for representation of the entity's visual appearance and position of its articulated parts. Hint: renamed as Variable Parameter in IEEE DIS 2012 revised standard.
attribute.name: articulationParameterArray

attribute.tooltip: [geoSystem &initializeOnlyLabel; &GeoSystemType;] Identifies spatial reference frame: Geodetic (GD), Geocentric (GC), Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM). Supported values: "GD" "UTM" or "GC" followed by additional quoted string parameters as appropriate for the type. Hint: X3D Architecture 25.2.2 Spatial reference frames https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/geodata.html#Spatialreferenceframes Hint: X3D Architecture 25.2.4 Specifying geospatial coordinates https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/geodata.html#Specifyinggeospatialcoords Hint: UTM is Universal Transverse Mercator coordinate system https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universal_Transverse_Mercator_coordinate_system Warning: deprecated values are GDC (replaced by GD) and GCC (replaced by GC).
attribute.name: geoSystem

attribute.tooltip: [geoCoords &inputOutputLabel; &SFVec3dLabel; "0 0 0"] Geographic location (specified in current geoSystem coordinates) for children geometry (specified in relative coordinate system, in meters). Hint: X3D for Advanced Modeling (X3D4AM) slideset https://x3dgraphics.com/slidesets/X3dForAdvancedModeling/GeospatialComponentX3dEarth.pdf Warning: requires X3D profile='Full' or else include <component name='Geospatial' level='1'/>
attribute.name: geoCoords

attribute.tooltip: [containerField type NMTOKEN "children"] containerField 是field标签的前缀, 表明了子节点和父节点的关系. 范例: geometry Box, children Group, proxy Shape. containerField 属性只有在X3D场景用XML编码时才使用. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, containerField https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#containerField
attribute.name: containerField

attribute.tooltip: [class type CDATA #IMPLIED] class 是用空格分开的类的列表, 保留给XML样式表使用. 只有X3D场景用XML编码时才支持class 属性.
attribute.name: class

element.tooltip: ReceiverPdu 是传播协议数据单元PDU信息的节点. Hint: X3D for Advanced Modeling (X3D4AM) slideset https://x3dgraphics.com/slidesets/X3dForAdvancedModeling/DistributedInteractiveSimulation.pdf Warning: requires X3D profile='Full' or else include <component name='DIS' level='1'/>
element.name: ReceiverPdu

attribute.tooltip: [DEF type ID #IMPLIED] DEF给这个节点定义了唯一的ID, 这样在其它节点里就可以引用这个节点. 提示: 为DEF命名时,使用有意义的描述性的名称可以帮助规范文件, 以提高文件可读性. Hint: well-defined names can simplify design and debugging through improved author understanding. Hint: X3D Scene Authoring Hints, Naming Conventions https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dSceneAuthoringHints.html#NamingConventions
attribute.name: DEF

attribute.tooltip: [USE type IDREF #IMPLIED] USE用来引用DEF定义的节点ID, 同时忽略其它的属性和子对象. 提示: 使用USE引用其它的对象而不是复制节点可以提高性能. 警告: 使用USE的代码不要包括DEF或其他的属性值!attribute!
attribute.name: USE

attribute.tooltip: [enabled &inputOutputLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "true"] 允许/禁止子节点的碰撞检测. 提示: VRML97规格中的 "collide" .
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.tooltip: [whichGeometry &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "1"] 选择渲染的几何体: -1 对应不选择几何体, 0 对应文本描述, 1 对应缺省几何体.
attribute.name: whichGeometry

attribute.tooltip: [bboxCenter &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "0 0 0"] 边界盒的中心: 从局部坐标系统原点的位置偏移. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxCenter

attribute.tooltip: [bboxSize &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFVec3fLabel; "-1 -1 -1"] 边界盒尺寸: 缺省情况下是自动计算的, 为了优化场景, 也可以强制指定. Hint: precomputation and inclusion of bounding box information can speed up the initialization of large detailed models, with a corresponding cost of increased file size. Hint: X3D Architecture, 10.2.2 Bounding boxes https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/group.html#BoundingBoxes
attribute.name: bboxSize

attribute.tooltip: [siteID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] 网络上参与者或组织的站点siteID.
attribute.name: siteID

attribute.tooltip: [applicationID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "1"] EntityID使用的ID, 以在应用中对应某个唯一的站点.
attribute.name: applicationID

attribute.tooltip: [entityID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] EntityID 在应用程序中使用的唯一的ID.
attribute.name: entityID

attribute.tooltip: [readInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "0.1"] [0,+∞) 读更新的间隔秒数, 0 值将不读. Hint: readInterval is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time.
attribute.name: readInterval

attribute.tooltip: [writeInterval &inputOutputLabel; &SFTimeLabel; "1.0"] [0,+∞) 写更新的间隔秒数, 0 值将不写. Hint: writeInterval is a nonnegative SFTime duration interval, not an absolute clock time.
attribute.name: writeInterval

attribute.tooltip: [networkMode &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; &DisNetworkModeValues; standAlone] 决定实体是否忽略网络, 是否向网络发送DIS数据包 , 或是否从网络接受DIS 数据包. (1) standAlone: 忽略网络但仍然回应局部场景的事件. (2) networkReader: 只监听网络, 根据readInterval间隔从网络读取PDU数据包, 作为实体的远程遥控拷贝. (3) networkWriter: 根据writeInterval间隔向网络发送PDU数据包, 以担当主实体(master entity). 缺省值 "standAlone" 确保激活场景中的DIS网络 有目的的设置 networkReader 或 networkWriter. Warning: do not wrap extra quotation marks around these SFString enumeration values, since "quotation" "marks" are only used for MFString values.
attribute.name: networkMode

attribute.tooltip: [isStandAlone &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否 networkMode="local" (忽略网络但仍然回应局部场景的事件) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isStandAlone

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkReader &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否networkMode="remote" (只监听网络, 根据readInterval间隔从网络读取PDU数据包, 作为实体的远程遥控拷贝) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isNetworkReader

attribute.tooltip: [isNetworkWriter &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否 networkMode="master" (根据writeInterval间隔向网络发送PDU数据包, 以担当主实体) Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isNetworkWriter

attribute.tooltip: [address &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; localhost] 多点传输的网址"或其他本地主机localhost" 例子: 224.2.181.145.
attribute.name: address

attribute.tooltip: [port &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] 多点传输端口 例子: 3000.
attribute.name: port

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayHost &inputOutputLabel; &SFStringLabel; #IMPLIED] 不能使用多点传输后使用的服务器网址. 例子: track.nps.edu.
attribute.name: multicastRelayHost

attribute.tooltip: [multicastRelayPort &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] 不能使用多点传输后使用的服务器端口. 例子: 8010.
attribute.name: multicastRelayPort

attribute.tooltip: [rtpHeaderExpected &initializeOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 是否DIS PDUs 中包含RTP headers.
attribute.name: rtpHeaderExpected

attribute.tooltip: [isRtpHeaderHeard &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; #FIXED ""] 是否传入的DIS 数据包包含RTP header. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isRtpHeaderHeard

attribute.tooltip: [isActive &outputOnlyLabel; &SFBoolLabel; "false"] 最近是否接收到网络更新? Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: isActive

attribute.tooltip: [timestamp &outputOnlyLabel; &SFTimeLabel; #FIXED ""] VRML单位的DIS时间戳. Warning: it is an error to define this transient outputOnly field in an X3D file, instead only use it a source for ROUTE events.
attribute.name: timestamp

attribute.tooltip: [radioID &SFInt32Label; "0"] Identifies a particular radio within a given entity.
attribute.name: radioID

attribute.tooltip: [receivedPower &inputOutputLabel; &SFFloatLabel; "0"] receivedPower indicates radio frequency (RF) power received, in units of decibel-milliwatts (dBm), after applying any propagation loss and antenna gain
attribute.name: receivedPower

attribute.tooltip: [receiverState &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] receiverState indicates if receiver is currently idle or busy via one of these enumerated values: 0 = off, 1 = on but not receiving, or 2 = on and receiving.
attribute.name: receiverState

attribute.tooltip: [transmitterSiteID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Simulation/exercise transmitterSiteID of the participating LAN or organization.
attribute.name: transmitterSiteID

attribute.tooltip: [transmitterApplicationID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"]Simulation/exercise transmitterApplicationID is unique for transmitter application at that site. Each simulation application that can respond to simulation management PDUs needs to have a unique applicationID.
attribute.name: transmitterApplicationID

attribute.tooltip: [transmitterEntityID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Simulation/exercise transmitterEntityID is a unique ID for a single entity within that application.
attribute.name: transmitterEntityID

attribute.tooltip: [transmitterRadioID &inputOutputLabel; &SFInt32Label; "0"] Identifies a particular radio within a given entity.
attribute.name: transmitterRadioID
